title: Incredible opportunity to own a fully furnished condo in 78704 that al
posting_body: ['Incredible opportunity to own a fully furnished condo in 78704 that allows short term rentals!', 'Low HOA and close to everything Austin has to offer.', 'Move-in ready 2 bedroom, 1 ½ bath condo.', 'A fabulous opportunity for an immediate Airbnb.', 'Stepping inside, you are met with an abundant natural light, stunning bohemian décor, and wide-plank hardwood flooring flowing throughout the home.', 'The generously sized living room is open to the dining area and kitchen – ideal for gathering or entertaining.', 'The kitchen has been thoughtfully designed with no wasted space – ceiling height cabinets, stylish gold hardware, unique light fixtures, stainless appliances, quartz countertops, and a single deep sink.', 'You will be thrilled to host all your guests here.', 'Upstairs, you will find two gorgeous bedrooms and a full bath.', 'The first bedroom offers a beautifully painted accent wall, window treatments, and a modern ceiling fan.', 'The second bedroom features ombre painted walls, modern ceiling fan, and window treatments.', 'The backyard provides the most incredible setting to soak up the sun or gaze at the stars.', 'A towering tree provides a wonderful blend of sunshine and shade – keeping you cool while relaxing with your favorite beverage or grilling.', 'Enjoy an evening outdoors by the fire – don’t forget to bring the marshmallows.', 'The yard has been complete with xeriscape – cutting down on lawn maintenance and conserving water.', 'Fantastic location with easy access to IH-35 and downtown Austin!', 'Convenient to all the South 1st Street hot spots – with ample choices of eclectic restaurants, unique bars, and cozy coffee shops at your fingertips.', 'Just a short trip to the newest entertainment district on S Menchaca Rd featuring plenty of venues to grab your favorite food or drinks – Armadillo Den, Moontower, Luster Pearl, South Austin Beer Garden, and Indian Roller.']
